channel.title: the Lich King is Defeated and Arthas is Dead what then ?
channel.description:
as you people already knew the news and saw the ending cinematic, the new LK is Bolvar Fordragon, and Arthas is Dead.
in my opinion the ending was great but the Death of Arthas is Kinda sad and disappointing.
~Discuss

item.source: the Lich King is Defeated and Arthas is Dead what then ?

item.title: the Lich King is Defeated and Arthas is Dead what then ?
item.dc:creator: therandus
item.description:
Burbinator:

Oh I didn’t know that. Maybe if they release WC4 or something I’ll start to care.

Actually, it would be cool if they released a new campaign for WC3, which includes everything important that happened in WoW.

yeah that would be cool, but wait you got something against wow? its a good game?

Bolvar is gonna try and keep the scourge off azeroth for a while but in the end, he will have to give in, and with the awsome blend of his strange dragon flame body and the orc shaman powers along with some unholy, you have someone that is going to be greater than arthas ever could be, which means we may have some trouble in the future if someone returns to icecrown trying to unleash him otherwise he’ll stay frozen and sleep along with the scourge

Read full topic
